description:
T1 Walnut - Reduce crown by 2-3m all around and shape
 T2 Lilac - Reduce crown by 1.5m in height and balance
 T3 Pear - Reduce crown by 2-3m in height and balance
 T4 Various - Prune all vegetation overhanging clients property from rear of No.20 to 1m beyond boundary line
 T5 Apple - Reduce crown by 2m all around and shape
 T6 Cherry - Fell to ground level
 T7 False Acacia - Reduce crown by up to 3m all around and balance
 T8 Mulberry - Reduce crown by up to 3m in height and balance, remove deadwood
 T9 False Acacia - Reduce crown by 3m in height and balance
 T10 Apple - Reduce crown by 2m and balance
 T11 Apple - Fell to ground level and grind stump
 T12 Quince - Reduce crown by 2m and shape
 T13 Cherry - Reduce crown by 2-3m all around and shape. Thin crown by 20%
